item.title: [Command] Players
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

here is the command from scaperune for players it works for me everyone else check it out and see if it works

} else if (command.startsWith("players")) { sendQuest("@dre@Players Online", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); String puserTitle = "player"; int questRow = 8145; for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if(person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null") { puserTitle = "player"; if(person.playerRights == 1) puserTitle = "developer"; if(person.playerRights == 2) puserTitle = "admin"; if(person.playerRights == 3) puserTitle = "mapper"; sendQuest("@dre@"+puserTitle+" "+person.playerName+" @dbl@ at("+person.absX+","+person.absY+")", questRow); questRow++; } } } questRow++; sendQuest("", questRow); questRow++; sendQuest("", questRow); sendQuest("@dre@Players Online", 8144); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream();

Read full topic
